title: # 318 - Anthony Cumia & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Anthony Cumia to talk about The Opie and Anthony show, The move to KROQ, Patrice O'Neal, how Anthony started his own podcast, getting fired, his favorite moments on radio, and much more!

Get Anthony Cumia's new book "Permanently Suspended" on Amazon today!

This episode is brought to you by 23andme. Go to www.23andme.com/bertcast and get 30% off any DNA kit.  

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Enter code “Bertcast” in the search bar and get 74% off the Omaha Steaks Family Gift Package at www.omahasteaks.com 

This podcast is also brought to you by Noom. Start your trial today and start losing weight for good at www.noom.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Tipsy Elves. Get 20% off your order by using code “Bertcast” at checkout. Get your ugly Christmas sweaters at www.tipsyelves.com 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
